ğŸ•Šï¸ Pazifist.help: Kann einmal im Spiel die Rolle eines Spielers aufdecken. An diesem Tag kann nicht abgestimmt werden.

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ’¼ PrÃ¤sident.help: Seine Rolle ist von Anfang an aufgedeckt. Wenn er stirbt, verliert das Dorf.

ğŸ¹ Amor.help: Kann in der ersten Nacht zwei Spieler verlieben, die am nÃ¤chsten Tag zum Paar werden. Gewinnt entweder mit dem Dorf oder mit dem Paar, wenn dieses bis zum Ende des Spiels am Leben bleibt.

ğŸ¤¬ Verfluchter Dorfbewohner.help: Ist ein normaler Dorfbewohner. Wenn er von den WerwÃ¶lfen angegriffen wird, wird er selbst zum Werwolf.

ğŸ’ Verliebter.help: Andere Rolle (siehe oben & unten) + stirbt, wenn sein Partner stirbt.

ğŸ’£ Terrorist.help: Wenn der Terrorist stirbt sterben die beiden Spieler links und rechts von dem Terroristen mit.

ğŸ§’ Das Wilde Kind.help: Sucht sich am Anfang ein Vorbild aus. Wenn es stirbt, wird er zum Werwolf. Wenn nicht, bleibt er Dorfbewohner.

ğŸº Werwolf.help: Kann jede Nacht zusammen mit den anderen WÃ¶lfen abstimmen, welcher Spieler getÃ¶tet wird.

ğŸº Alphawerwolf.help: Werwolf, der in der Nacht bei der Wahl, welcher Spieler getÃ¶tet werden soll, zwei Stimmen hat.

ğŸº Wolfschamane.help: Kann am Tag ein zusÃ¤tzliches Ziel bestimmen. Das ausgewÃ¤hlte Ziel wird, wenn es von Sehern angesehen wird, als Wolfschamane zu sehen sein.

ğŸº Hexer.help: Kann jede Nacht die Rolle eines Spielers aufdecken. Kann zwar abstimmen, kann aber nicht mit den anderen WerwÃ¶lfen schreiben.

ğŸ¤¡ Narr.help: Hat keine besonderen FÃ¤higkeiten. Gewinnt, wenn das Dorf ihn lyncht.

â˜ ï¸ SerienmÃ¶rder.help: Kann jede Nacht einen Spieler tÃ¶ten. Kann nicht von den WerwÃ¶lfen getÃ¶tet werden. Gewinnt, wenn er der letzte Ãœberlebende ist.

ğŸ”¥ Brandstifter.help: Kann jede Nacht entweder zwei Spieler mit Benzin Ã¼bergieÃŸen oder alle bisher Ã¼bergossenen Spieler anzÃ¼nden. Kann nicht von den WerwÃ¶lfen getÃ¶tet werden. Gewinnt, wenn er der letzte Ãœberlebende ist.

ğŸ’£ Bomber.help: Kann jede Nacht eine Bombe auf einen Spieler platzieren. Sie wird in der nÃ¤chsten Nacht explodieren. Gewinnt, wenn er der letzte Ãœberlebende ist.

ğŸ§Ÿ Zombie.help: Kann jede Nacht einen Spieler auswÃ¤hlen, der in der nÃ¤chsten Nacht ebenfalls zum Zombie wird. Jeder Zombie kann einen anderen Spieler auswÃ¤hlen. Gewinnt, wenn alle Dorfbewohner (keine WerwÃ¶lfe) zu Zombies geworden sind.

ğŸ‘©â€ Doctor.help: Can choose one player each night who cannot be killed that night

ğŸ¥· Bodyguard.help: Can select one player each night. If that player is attacked that night, the bodyguard is attacked instead. The bodyguard survives the first attack, but dies on a second.

ğŸ’ª Tough guy.help: Can protect one player each night. When the Tough Guy or the player he protects is attacked, he and his attacker see each other's roles. The night after the attack, the Tough Guy dies.

ğŸ”« Shooter.help: Can shoot any player twice in the game and once a day. However, after the first shot, his role is revealed.

ğŸ—ï¸ Prison Guard.help: Can choose a player each day to be put in jail the next night. He can talk to the prisoner privately and anonymously. The jailer can shoot one of his prisoners per game

â›ª Priest.help: Can throw holy water at a player once in the game. If this player is a werewolf, he dies, if not, the priest dies.

ğŸ‘€ Viewer.help: Can watch the role of a player every night.

ğŸ’« Aura Viewer.help: Can view each night whether a player is good, bad or unknown.

ğŸ‘ï¸ Viewer apprentice.help: Is a normal villager until the seer dies. Then he becomes the new seer.

ğŸ•µï¸ Detective.help: Can select two players each night and see if they are on the same team or on different teams.

ğŸ”® Medium.help: Can talk to the dead anonymously every night and can revive one of the dead villagers once in the game.

ğŸ—½ Mayor.help: Can reveal his role once game, causing his vote to count double when voting on all subsequent days.

ğŸ§™ Witch.help: Has two potions. One kills a player, the other protects a player. Each potion can only be used once.

ğŸ—¡ï¸ Hunter.help: Villager who can choose a player to die when he dies.

âš”ï¸ï¸ Beast Hunter.help: Can place a trap on a player each night, which becomes active the next night. If the player the trap is placed on is attacked the next night, a random werewolf dies.

ğŸ•Šï¸ Pacifist.help: Can reveal a player's role once in the game. Cannot vote that day.

ğŸ§“ Old quirk.help: Can choose a player after the first night, can't write or vote the next day.

ğŸ‘©ğŸ’¼ President.help: His role is revealed from the beginning. If he dies, the village loses.

ğŸ¹ Cupid.help: Can make two players fall in love on the first night, and they become a couple the next day. Wins either with the village or with the couple if they stay alive until the end of the game.

ğŸ¤¬ Cursed Villager.help: Is a normal villager. When attacked by the werewolves, he becomes a werewolf himself.

ğŸ’ Lover.help: Other role (see above & below) + dies when his partner dies.

ğŸ’£ Terrorist.help: When the terrorist dies, the two players to the left and right of the terrorist die with him.

ğŸ§’ Wild Child.help: Picks a role model at the beginning. If it dies, he becomes a werewolf. If not, he remains a villager.

ğŸº Werewolf.help: Can vote every night along with the other wolves which player will be killed.

ğŸº Alpha Werewolf.help: Werewolf who has two votes that night in choosing which player to kill.

ğŸº Wolf Shaman.help: May designate an additional target during the day. The selected target, when viewed by seers, will be seen as a wolf shaman.

ğŸº Wolf Seer.help: Can reveal a player's role each night, but cannot vote. Can give up his ability to see and vote once for the entire game. If he is the last wolf, he becomes a normal werewolf.

ğŸº Junior Werewolf.help: Can designate an additional target. When the junior werewolf dies, its target dies with it.

ğŸº Warlock.help: Can reveal a player's role each night. Can vote, but cannot write with the other werewolves.

ğŸ¤¡ Jester.help: Has no special abilities. Wins if the village lynches him.

ğŸ’° Bounty Hunter.help: Has no special abilities. Wins if he can convince the village to vote for his target to die. If his target dies in any other way, he becomes a normal villager. His target can only be a villager whose role does not reveal itself (e.g., the target cannot be a gunner).

â˜ ï¸ Serial Killer.help: Can kill a player every night. Cannot be killed by the werewolves. Wins if he is the last survivor.

ğŸ”¥ Arsonist.help: Can either douse two players with gasoline each night or set all previously doused players on fire. Cannot be killed by the werewolves. Wins if he is the last survivor.

ğŸ’£ Bomber.help: Can place a bomb on a player every night. It will explode the next night. Wins if he is the last survivor.

â›ª Cult Leader.help: Can choose one player each night to join his cult the next day. Wins when all villagers (no werewolves) have joined his cult. Werewolves or special roles cannot join the cult.

ğŸ§Ÿ Zombie.help: Can select a player each night who will also become a zombie the next night. Each zombie can select a different player. Wins when all villagers (no werewolves) have become zombies.

â›ª Cultist..help: Other role (see above) + dies when cult leader dies.

ğŸ› ï¸ Saboteur.help: Can select a player each night who cannot say anything or vote the next day. At the end of the day, the selected player dies.
